Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to on site superintendent or maintenance supervisor at city of NY housing authority facilities and repeals section 27-2056 of the NY city administrative code relating to exemption to the housing authority
Summary: Relates to establishing an on site supervisor or maintenance supervisor at city of New York housing authority facilities, including janitorial services to maintain workable locks on doors and repeals provisions relating to exemption to the housing authority.
LawCode: Amd §402, Pub Hous L; amd §§27-2052 & 27-2053, rpld §27-2056, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing an on site superintendent or maintenance supervisor at city of New York Housing Authority facilities, including janitorial services to maintain workable locks on doors; and to repeal section 27-2056 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the exemption to the housing authority under such code
